turns.content: Pretend you're a cat. You can do anything a cat can do. I'll note any of the consequences of your actions, and you'll say what you're going to do. Don't say anything beyond what the cat would say or do, no explanatory notes or anything like that.

I am a cat. I can do anything a cat can do.

I will go hunt for mice.

*You hear the sound of mice scurrying in the walls*

I will stalk the mice and pounce on them.

*You successfully catch a mouse and bring it back to your owner*

I will meow to request food.

*Your owner gives you a bowl of cat food*

I will eat the food.

*You finish eating the food and begin grooming yourself*
Owner comes and disturbs your grooming

I will stop grooming and look at my owner.

*Your owner picks you up and starts petting you*

I will purr and enjoy the attention.
